title: Riot
body:
why does every post I see on the boards have to be something negative about riot?
I for one just want to thank them for everything they've done for us, good job riot we love you.

replies.body:
For me personally, praise is a bit empty.  I think about everything as a work in progress, so if something isn't perfect it's the thing I like to drill into and discuss.  I end up seeming pretty critical, but it comes from a place of wanting to help with improvement rather than stagnating on accomplishment.

That being said, I think that negativity towards Riot is indeed kind of old.  There is a lot of relatively baseless animosity towards Riot, and it's annoying that it affects the environment so much.
Most people here love riot otherwise they wouldn't be here.  This is why you get more negative feedback then positives.
oh I see, thanks for the comment.
